name: Maggi Papare Kottu Noodles
description: MAGGI Papare Kottu - Have you tried the latest Kottu in town?! Introducing Maggi Papare Kottu, a mouth-watering and tongue-tingling Noodle made using Onion, Garlic, Chilli and Pepper. Maggi Papare Kottu also has a new broad noodle strand giving all noodles fans a great mouthfeel and makes you keep asking for more! What more, this product has no added artificial colours or flavours! *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
